text: "Suave Y Sutil" is a Pop rock song by Mexican singer Paulina Rubio. The song was released to digital retailers and streaming services by the Latino division of Universal Music Group on September 7, 2018 as the five single from Rubio's eleventh studio album "Deseo". The song was written by Xavi San Martín by La Oreja de Van Gogh, with a production by Andrés Torres and Mauricio Rengifo. ==Music video== In the video, she shows herself as a strong woman who no longer needs her partner to be happy. title: Suave y Sutil
